title: Tabber
subtitle: Ultimate Tab Organization Solution
description: Simplify your browsing by preserving unused tabs into organized groups of virtual tabs and synchronize them with all devices.
Install Tabber for a clutter-free browsing experience.
Available on Chrome, Edge, Firefox, and Opera. Streamline your tabs today!
install.info: Browser-native tab groups manipulation is only available on Chrome, Edge and Opera (not Opera GX). For the best experience, we recommend using Tabber on one of these browsers.

pricing.title: Tabber is free to use!
pricing.description: Pay only for additional special features and if you want to support the development of Tabber.

paragraphs.title: About Tabber
description: Tabber is a revolutionary browser extension designed to streamline and enhance your online experience by offering a unique virtual browser-like interface for managing tabs. It allows users to effortlessly group and organize unused tabs into customizable virtual tab groups, providing a clutter-free and efficient browsing environment.

With Tabber, you can easily preview tabs through screenshots, synchronize your tab groups across devices for seamless access, and personalize your experience with a wide range of customization settings. Itâ€™s a simple and intuitive solution to the problem of tab clutter, allowing you to focus on what matters most.

paragraphs.title: About the Creator
description: I'm a dedicated software developer from Ukraine, passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly software solutions. As a solo developer, I've crafted a diverse range of projects, each reflecting my commitment to functionality and user experience. You can explore my portfolio of works at neulen.dev, showcasing the breadth of my expertise.
I hope you enjoy using Tabber as much as I enjoyed creating it!
